Production Co: Mikado Films, Company Credits, Arte France Cinema, Canal+, Greenpoint Films, StudioCanal, Bac Films, Téléma, France 2 Cinéma, Azor Films, Westdeutscher Rundfunk
Synopsis: A man (Mark Rylance) wants to know more about the nameless woman (Kerry Fox) with whom he has weekly trysts.
Title: Intimacy
